projects.title: WNFA 3D Virtual Gallery
projects.desc: A 3D website that displays the poster results generated by WNFA at Zhejiang Exhibition Hall from 06.01.2022 to 06.12.2022

projects.title: WNFA Poster Generator
projects.desc: A website that uses neural network, python computer vision libraries and art grid method to convert a poem into a visual poster, powered by Azure serverless computing products.

projects.title: ASCII Art Generator
projects.desc: A website that uses client side opencv.js to convert gif, static image, and video to dynamic ASCII art.

projects.title: DEVUE
projects.desc: A creatively designed, interactive frontend website featuring custom-built logics that replicate a graphical desktop environment, providing fully resizable windows within the website itself.

projects.title: REACO
projects.desc: A creatively designed frontend website featuring a custom-built controller system, separate from the React DOM, which offers a Unix-like console experience to the frontend.
